thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Pierre Savoie
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Pierre Savoie

author: Pierre Savoie
title: Pierre Savoie
text: I really appreciate Banggood website to make purchases of articles that are sometime difficult to find on the market. They are of great quality. Delivery is practically always free and lasts for about 30 days from China to Canada. I've always received my merchandise. But lately, I did not receive my package after the guarantee period of 26 days. On the 45th days, I sent them an email and the after-sales service immediately refunded the price of the purchase without discussion. It was the first time I had this problem. It is in these moments that we can realize just how effective Banggood service is. With Banggood, I am assured of doing business with trustful people for my next purchases.
